rows.label: bf05380100_0005
rows.name:
As you may know, there is a demilitarized
zone between Superbia and Invidia.

rows.label: bf05380100_0010
rows.name:
"Temperantia," which was supposed to be
promised as a non-militarized zone,

rows.label: bf05380100_0020
rows.name: We received a report that combat has begun.

rows.label: bf05380100_0030
rows.name: Superbia are in possession of a Divine Beast weapon.

rows.label: bf05380100_0040
rows.name:
They're advancing as we speak towards the
Invidian garrison.

rows.label: bf05380100_0090
rows.name:
Well, the two countries' Divine Beasts are at their closest
right now...

rows.label: bf05380100_0100
rows.name: You're saying we were waiting for a chance to strike?

rows.label: bf05380100_0120
rows.name:
Our people would never go to war 
against His Majesty's will!

rows.label: bf05380100_0130
rows.name: At any rate, we must investigate.

rows.label: bf05380100_0150
rows.name:
Your Holiness, I will hurry to confirm and try to resolve the situation.
Excuse me.

rows.label: bf05380100_0180
rows.name:
I'd like to request the assistance of 
Special Inquisitor Meleph. Would that be alright?

rows.label: bf05380100_0190
rows.name:
We have no reason to refuse.
And you needn't worry about me.

rows.label: bf05380100_0200
rows.name: I am quite grateful to hear that.
